I am a self-taught user experience researcher & user interface designer based in Toronto specialising in graphical prototyping for web and mobile platforms.

It of utmost importance to me to use my knowledge and time doing something that I am deeply excited and passionate about. I do not believe in slogging away doing something I feel apathetic towards; I would much rather enjoy my days to their fullest extent, and wake up looking forward to the day no matter how long itâ€™s going to be, because I know I will love every minute of it..
